plugin.name: FOP2 Manager Autoconfiguration
plugin.description: Needed for having new buttons added/removed from FOP2 when your backend performs an asterisk reload. You must have the FOP2 Manager installed and point the reload_script variable to the full path of the update_conf.php script.
plugin.description-es_ES: Este plugin actualizar√° las bases de datos del FOP2 Manager con nuevos botones o configuraciones cada vez que Asterisk sea recargado (reload). Debe apuntar la variable scriptreload a la ruta completa del script update_conf.php del FOP2 Manager.
plugin.changelog: *1.0.4* Call FOP2RELOAD userevent when finish to signal FOP2 to reload configs *1.0.3* Add channelreload event support so it also reloads on it *1.0.2* Set config name to use name_name for consistency *1.0.1* Add reload on User Event *1.0.0* Stable release
